trans-unit.source: The final stage of this tutorial is to build and run your new app.
trans-unit.target: The final stage of this tutorial is to build and run your new app.

trans-unit.source: Browse to the location where you saved the compressed project files, expand the files on your computer, and open the solution file in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Browse to the location where you saved the compressed project files, expand the files on your computer, and open the solution file in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Press the F5 key to rebuild the project and start the app.
trans-unit.target: Press the F5 key to rebuild the project and start the app.

trans-unit.source: In the app, type meaningful text, such as Complete the tutorial, in Insert a TodoItem, and then click Save.
trans-unit.target: In the app, type meaningful text, such as Complete the tutorial, in Insert a TodoItem, and then click Save.

trans-unit.source: This sends a POST request to the new mobile service hosted in Azure.
trans-unit.target: This sends a POST request to the new mobile service hosted in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Data from the request is inserted into the TodoItem table.
trans-unit.target: Data from the request is inserted into the TodoItem table.

trans-unit.source: Items stored in the table are returned by the mobile service, and the data is displayed in the second column in the app.
trans-unit.target: Items stored in the table are returned by the mobile service, and the data is displayed in the second column in the app.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) In a universal Windows solution, change the default start up project to the other app and run the app again.
trans-unit.target: (Optional) In a universal Windows solution, change the default start up project to the other app and run the app again.

trans-unit.source: Notice that data saved from the previous step is loaded from the mobile service after the app starts.
trans-unit.target: Notice that data saved from the previous step is loaded from the mobile service after the app starts.

trans-unit.source: Back in the Management Portal, click the Data tab and then click the TodoItems table.
trans-unit.target: Back in the Management Portal, click the Data tab and then click the TodoItems table.

trans-unit.source: This lets you browse the data inserted by the app into the table.
trans-unit.target: This lets you browse the data inserted by the app into the table.
